base.name: ObjectDetection
base.description: Detect objects in images. Model was trained on COCO 2017 object detection. Output is a list of python dictionary containing the "label", "score" and "box" (xmin, ymin, xmax, ymax) for each object detected.

parameter_definitions.name: model
parameter_definitions.description: Object detection model. Only "detr-resnet-50" supported for now.
